attributes.action: Make it illegal to sell real fur in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
I will not post pictures due to them being so horrific. Here is a link to just one fur farm:

http://features.peta.org/ChineseFurFarms/

There are hundreds of reports online and images for personal research. 

Please help to bring this petition to the government. A change in law is needed. 

Thanks for your support.
attributes.background:
I live in a small village and local retail shops are selling real fur garments. 
The trade of real fur has grown in popularity over the last few years and the horrific cruelty that takes place in fur farms is absolutely heartbreaking. Animals kept in tiny cages, abused daily and skinned alive.
